Shield your good times as the dynamic Stone 352 is equipped with IPX7 Splash & Water Shield??? rain or poolside we got you covered! Party from dusk till dawn with its 12H nonstop playtime & double the impact as you connect 2 Stone 352s via the TWS feature. The super bass and gripping stereo sound are carefully curated by acoustic experts. It's time to dive into an immersive listening experience like never before.Ergonomic Cylindrical Design For Enhanced PortabilityTake your beats wherever you go with the super portable, ergonomically cylindrical designed speaker and never stop grooving.Take your beats wherever you go with the super portable, ergonomically cylindrical designed speaker and never stop grooving.??IPX7 Splash & Water ShieldTake your party outside without a worry with IPX7 Splash & Water Shield. Whether it is rain or poolside, Stone 352 will always match your vibe.Up To 12H Nonstop PlaytimeThe party mustn't stop. So, power yourself up with your favourite music with up to 12 hours of total playback time.TWS Speaker For Greater ImpactEnjoy your music the truly wireless way. Connect two Stone 352s to play music simultaneously on both the speakers and dive into the sound of your choice with twice the impact.SpecificationsConnect & PlaySpeaker TypePortable Wireless SpeakerSpeaker Size1.96 inchBluetooth Versionv5.0Bluetooth Range10mBattery Capacity2200mAhPlaying TimeUp to 12 HoursCharging TimeAbout 1.5-2 hoursWater ResistanceIPX7Country Of OriginChina Multiple Connectivity ModesBLUETOOTH V5.0, TF CARD & AUX. Experience perfect pairing with Stone 352. It???s all just a click away.

descriptor.name: boAt Airdopes 131 PRO | Wireless Earbuds with ENx??? Noise cancellation technology, BEAST mode, 45 hours of battery life, IPX5 Sweat & Water Resistance
descriptor.short_desc: Enjoy Seamless Audio With Airdopes 131 PRO's Noise Cancellation Technology And 11mm Driver. It Comes With 45 Hours Of Battery Life On A Single Charge, Enabled With Beast??? Mode. Shop Now!
descriptor.long_desc: Airdopes 131 PRO Wireless Earbuds With Long Battery LifeNeed the latest and greatest to elevate your media experience? Up the ante with Airdopes 131 Pro. Real gaming takes the stage with ENx??? Noise cancellation technology and BEAST mode. Let the fun begin with Airdopes 131 PRO.11mm Drivers For Sound That???s More ProfoundDance to the tunes of perfection. With 11mm drivers, the bass is stronger, the treble is higher and the sound is crisper.Clear as Crystal with ENx??? Noise Cancellation Technology Soundreimagined. boAt???s noise cancellation tech along with Passive noise cancellation electronically adjusts ambient noise and cuts out unwanted sound, thereby producing pure, magical audio that is unmatched and unrivalled. Seamless Synced Sound with BEAST??? ModeNew standards in entertainment. Every pin drop translates immediately. Never miss a single footstep due to audio lag. With 65ms ping, whether it's gaming or media consumption, experience seamless audio with BEAST??? Mode.45 Hours of Endless Musical BlissIn for the long haul? No worries! Airdopes 131 PRO can keep up with anything and everything. 45 hours of battery life means you can go without charging and if you do run out of juice, boAt???s ASAP??? Fast Charge gives you 60 minutes of playtime with only 5 mins of charging.Don???t Fret the Sweat with IPX5 Water ResistanceIf there is one thing that ruins electronics, its water. Thankfully, with IPX5 Water resistance, there???s nothing to worry about. Everything is sealed inside an air-tight housing, it protects water from entering your earphones increasing its longevity.Type-C Interface IPX5 Sweat & Splash Resistance One-Touch Voice Assistant SpecificationsConnect & PlayBluetooth VersionV5.3+EDRDriver Size11mm x 2 DriversBluetooth ProfilesHSP, HFP, A2DP, AVRCP, AVCTP, GAVDPFrequency20Hz-20KHzVoice AssistantYesEarphone battery capacity400mAh(Case), 40mAh x 2 budsTalk time/music time3 Hours per budCharging Time30min(Earbuds), 2 Hours(Case)Bluetooth Range10MCountry Of OriginChinaFAQsQ. How can we pause and play tracks?Single tap the capacitive touch control on either earbud to play a song or to pause one. Airdopes 131 Pro comes with a host of intuitive features that allow one to seamlessly control music. Please refer to the instruction manual to learn about the different ways one can take advantage of its features.Q. Can we accept calls on boAt Airdopes 131 PRO?Yes, Airdopes 131 PRO comes supports dual microphones with ENx??? Tech that allows for an unrivalled calling and media experience.Q. Can Iuse any adapter to charge my device?Yes, you can use any Type-C compatible adapter to charge your Airdopes 131 PRO Charging case.Q. Are Airdopes 131 PRO waterproof and sweat resistant?Yes, Airdopes 131 PRO is IPX5 Water and Sweat resistant. You can use it for your workouts or carry them along on long trips.Q. Can I charge my earphones with a mobile charger?Yes, Airdopes 131 Pro supports Type-C charging. If your mobile charger comes with Type-C charging support then you can easily use the same to charge your device.Q. Is it good for longer gym workouts and sweating over 2+ hours?Yes, Airdopes 131 PRO comes with IPX5 water resistance along with a huge battery capacity making it perfect for gym workouts that last more than 2 hours.Q. Does it support Google voice assistant and Apple Siri?Yes, Airdopes 131 PRO comes with full support for Google voice assistant and Apple Siri.Q. Is there a warranty for the product? How do I claim warranty?Yes, all of our true wireless earphones come with a 1 year warranty. To register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.DOWNLOAD MANUAL

descriptor.short_desc: Deuce 330 2 in 1 CableboAt Deuce USB 330 2-in-1 Type C + Micro USB cable is compatible with most smartphones, tablets, PC peripherals, Bluetooth speakers, power banks, game consoles, cameras, hard drives and all other Type C or Micro USB port enabled devices. The cable ensures 3A fast charging and data transmissions with rapid sync at 480 mbps. The premium braided skin makes it tough and the stress resistant, flexible design makes it last 10 times longer than other standard cables. With 10000+ Bends Lifespan the Aluminium alloy shellhousing offers longevity with extended frame protection for strain relief. Deuce USB 330 cable offers a perfect 1.5 meters in length for smooth & hassle-free user experience.UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITYThe boAt Deuce USB 300 2 in 1 cable is compatible with smartphones, tablets, PC peripherals, Bluetooth speakers, power banks and all other devices with Type-C as well as Micro USB port.High-Speed Data Transmission & Fast ChargingIt ensures 3A fast charging and data transmissions with rapid sync at 480 mbps.Premium BraidingThe premium braided skin makes it sturdy and invincible against external damage.??SpecificationsConnect & PlayUniversal Compatibility: 2-in-1 Type C + Micro USB cable.3A fast charging and data transmissions with rapid sync at 480 Mbps.Premium Braided Skin.Resilient and flexible design.Aluminum alloy shell housing with 10000+ Bends Lifespan.2 years warranty provided by the manufacturer from date of purchase Superior 1.5M LengthDeuce 330 cable offers a perfect 1.5 meters in length forsmooth & hassle-free user experience.FAQQ. Does it support fast charging?boAt Deuce 330 supports power delivery at 3A charging speed.Q. What is the data transfer speed?boAt Deuce 330 supports a maximum data transfer speed of up to 480mbps.Q. descriptor.name: boAt Rockerz 255R
descriptor.short_desc: boAt Rockerz 255RHave you ditched the 3.5mm headphones jack and now looking for a good pair of Bluetooth Earphones to go wireless? Well look no further. You may wonder where we put it, but it is all there: The new Rockerz 255R is equipped with the latest Bluetooth 4.1-CSR8635 chipset and 10mm drivers. Together they ensure crystal clear wireless transmission in true HD sound.boAt Signature AudioboAtRockerz 255R, while being lightweight in design pumps out your favorite tunes with powerful HD sound and deep boosted bass. The 10mm drivers installed to ensure that you get an exceptional sound experience with articulate audio reproduction with a blend of pitch-perfect frequency response. The sound produced by the best wireless headphones boAt Rockerz 255R ensures that you differentiate music from noise and hear your favorite artists the way they were meant to be heard!Attractive ergonomics with a Comfort FitBuilt with uncompromised craftsmanship from premium materials including metal housing earphones and chrome accents the boAt Rockerz 255R is both sturdy and stylish.Powered By Qualcomm CSR8635 ChipsetHigh Level functionality is provided to the boAt Rockerz 255R by the Advanced Qualcomm CSR 8635 Chipset providing the features of the latest Bluetooth 4.1 Version, Frequency Response: 20Hz-20KHz.??SpecificationsConnect & PlayHeadphone TypeIn-EarIPX RatingIPX5Driver TypeDynamic??Driver Size10 mmImpedance16??Sensitivity (dB)- 98dB??3DBFrequency Response20Hz-20KHzBattery Capacity (mAh)110 mAhPlayback Time6 hoursPower Source3.7V/120 mAhCompatibilityAll Bluetooth DevicesCharging Time1.5 hoursStandby Time150 hoursTalktime6 hoursCountry Of OriginChinaBluetooth VersionV4.1 IPX 5 CertifiedProtected against the bi-products of your workout, don???t be afraid to let the Rockerz 255R catch a little sweat with its IPX 5 Sweat and Water Resistance. Sound in, Sweat out.FAQQ. Can we accept calls on it? Is it good for calls, meetings and work from home?Yes, a single press on the multi-function button allows the user to easily accept and reject calls. Rockerz 255R are designed for great clarity and comfort during meetings and important calls.Q. Can we adjust the length of the wire?No, the length of the wire cannot be adjusted.Q. Does it have a dedicated microphone?Yes, Rockerz 255R earphones has a dedicated mic perfect for calls and recording.Q. Can I charge my earphones with a mobile charger?Yes, Rockerz 255Rearphones can be charged with a mobile charger.Q. How long does it take to charge? Does it support fast charging?Rockerz 255R takes around 1.5H to charge. It does not support fast charging.Q. Can we use it while putting the earphones on charge?Yes, one can use the device while charging it at the same time.Q. What bluetooth version does Rockerz 255R support?Rockerz 255R Bluetooth earphones supports Bluetooth v4.1.Q. What can I do with the inline buttons?You can change tracks, adjust volume, take and reject calls, redial, and access voice assistant with the inline buttons. For further information, please refer to the user manual.Q. How can I enable Google and Siri?Double tap to connect with Google & Siri and activate the voice assistant. Please refer to the manual for further instructions.Q. Is there a warranty for the product? How do I claim warranty?Yes, all of our wireless earphones & headphones come with a 1 year warranty. To register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.DOWNLOAD MANUAL

Rockerz 255R are designed for great clarity and comfort during meetings and important calls.Q. Can we adjust the length of the wire?No, the length of the wire cannot be adjusted.Q. Does it have a dedicated microphone?Yes, Rockerz 255R earphones has a dedicated mic perfect for calls and recording.Q. Can I charge my earphones with a mobile charger?Yes, Rockerz 255R earphones can be charged with a mobile charger.Q. How long does it take to charge? Does it support fast charging?Rockerz 255R takes around 1.5H to charge. It does not support fast charging.Q. Can we use it while putting the earphones on charge?Yes, one can use the device while charging it at the same time.Q. For further information, please refer to the user manual.Q. How can I enable Google and Siri?Double tap to connect with Google & Siri and activate the voice assistant. Please refer to the manual for further instructions.Q. Is there a warranty for the product? How do I claim warranty?Yes, all of our wireless earphones & headphones come with a 1 year warranty. descriptor.name: boAt BassHeads 242
descriptor.short_desc: boAt BassHeads 242Get ready to redefine fitness fashion and utility with the wired headphone boAt Bassheads 242, it???s time to get your sport on. It carries ear hooks that are crafted from silicon to maximize comfort and a secure fit that allows you to maximize your workouts. Coated with IPX 4 sweat and water protection, the Bassheads 242 emphasizes on all-around ability with 10mm drivers that reproduce a quality sound. Move around freely with the superior coated cable that reaches comfortably from your pocket till your ears. Connect to a number of devices with ease using the 3.5mm straight jack, because there???s no stress, only sweetness when you???re riding the waves on this boAt. You can tune in and out with the pause/play button that can also take calls (With In-line Mic.) and control volume in-between exercise reputations.HD Inspirational SoundFly into your workouts with precise tones that inspire and energize your system to become the soundtrack to your Nirvana, its HD sound all the time.10mm Dynamic DriversFind a balanced audio sound set pumped through 10 mm dynamic drivers that can get real loud! Propped up by a banging bass, push your flow to higherlimits.IPX 4 Water ResistantEar-budsGet the sound in and sweat out with IPX 4 Water and Sweat Resistance here to elevate your game as crush those repetitions or a rigorous run.??SpecificationsConnect & PlayHeadphone TypeIn-EarSuper Extra BassYesDriver Size10 mmImpedance32??Sensitivity (dB)101db ??3dbFrequency Response20Hz-20KHzNoise IsolationPassiveMicrophone??YesCountry Of OriginChinaRated Power3mWCompatibilityAll 3.5mm Jack DeviceEasy Access Controls with In-line micCoolly crafted midway down the cable to endorse practicality mixed with an aesthetic design that allows for communication and music playlist control.FAQsQ. Can I pause/play & change tracks with the earphones?Yes, one can pause/play, change tracks, pick and hang up calls. Bassheads 242 comes with a host of intuitive features that allows one to seamlessly control music. Please refer to the instruction manual to learn about the different ways one can take advantage of its features.Q. Does it have an in-line microphone?Yes, Bassheads 242 comes with an in-line microphone. The microphone also features in-built noise isolation technology.Q. Is it good for meetings and calls?Yes, with its in-line microphone and in in-built noise isolation technology, Bassheads 242 is perfect for meetings and working from home.Q. Does it come with noise cancellation?Yes, Bassheads 242 comes with passive noise cancellation.Q. What is the length of the cable?The cable is 1200mm long.Q. Is there a warranty for the product? How do I claim warranty?Yes, all of our earphones come with a 1 year warranty. To register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.

descriptor.name: boAt Wave Neo | 1.69" HD Display, Upto 7 Days Battery Life, IP68 Sweat & Water Resistant, 100+ Watch Faces
descriptor.short_desc: Watch Wave Neo - Stylish Smartwatch For Men & WomenIntroducing a #NeoWay to live smart and stylish ??? the all-new Watch Wave Neo. Check everything that you need in a smartwatch and then get some more. Packed with a 1.69 inches screen, 550 nits brightness & 2.5D Curved Display ??? Watch Wave Neo will make your world better & brighter.Aesthetic Neo DisplayGet ready to experience vibrance like never before with a 1.69??? Full Touch Display. Experience everything better and brighter with 550 nits brightness and a super smooth interface.Flaunt ???em Neo CurvesLooks good, fits better, feels great. The 2.5D Curved Display appeals to the eyes and makes you stand out..??Slim and SlayLight in weight, heavy on featuresWatch Wave Neo weighs just 35 gms! This makes it comfortable to be worn all day. Be it for work or a party, this smartwatch is sure to match all your OOTDs.Commit To Be FitGame up your daily fitness schedule with 10 active sports modes including Walking, Running, Cycling, Climbing, Yoga, Basketball, Football, Badminton, Skipping & Swimming.Prioritize Your WellbeingKeep all those stressors at bay with its smart health tracker that constantly monitors your heart rate and blood oxygen levels. Begin your journey to a healthier lifestyle with keen insights about your health status.Fuel Up Your Everyday GoalsThere???s never a dull day with sedentary alerts to achieve your goals. Step up for every challenge and set daily reminders for targets..SpecificationsConnect & PlayModelWatch Wave NeoScreen Type1.69 inch HD DisplayBattery Capacity220mAhBluetooth VersionBLE 5.1Working Temperature0-45 degreeCharging Timeabout 2 hoursWorking TimeUp to 7 daysCountry Of OriginChina Flaunt Your Story With Personalized Watch FacesSlay a neo look every day with 100+ watch faces and customisation. Get spoiled for choices and download more watch faces from the boAt Wearable App.Never Miss Out On Any Big NewsThere???s no room for FOMO with Wave Neo. Get all important updates right on your wrist, without checking your phone. These notifications include calls, texts, social media notifications and alarms to keep you connected at all times.Tap into Music and MemoriesWave Neo is your new party pal that lets you play music and capture all your moments right from your wrist. One click for a forever memory!Resists It All Extra Durable, Highly ReliableWith IP68, it resists everything from dust, sweat and splash. Don???t worry about rain or the summer sweat, Wave Neo is tough enough to take it all.??Comprehensive Sleep TrackingSleep peacefully every night and meet your resting goals with its sleep tracking feature. Track and analyze your sleep quality to maintain a healthy lifestyle pattern.Impressive Battery PerformanceDo more of what you love without any interruptions. Wave Neo???s extra-long battery life lasts up to 7 days on a single charge, making you seize the week, effortlessly.FAQsQ. Does Watch Wave Neo come with different watch faces?Yes, Watch Wave Neo comes with support for multiple watch faces and themes.Q. Does it have water resistance? Is it good for long-term outdoor use?Watch Wave Neo comes with IP68 Dust and Water resistance which makes it perfect for outdoor use.Q. Does it come with support for GPS?Watch Wave Neo does not come with an in-built GPS.Q. Does it come with Media controls?Yes, Watch Wave Neo comes with support for media controls. Now control your music with just a single tap on the watch.Q. Does Watch Wave Neo have photography control?Yes, Watch Wave Neo comes with support for photography control directly from the watch.Q. What Health Features does Watch Wave Neo support?Watch Wave Neo comes with a host of health features including blood oxygen, breathe control mode, sleep tracking, stress tracker and more.Q. Does it support notifications for particular apps?Yes, Watch Wave Neo supports notification alerts for multiple applications, including calls, texts, social media notifications, sedentary & hydration alerts, and alarms. It also supports temperature monitoring for supported apps.Q. Is there a warranty for the product? How do I claim warranty?Yes, all of our Smart Watches come with a 1 year warranty. To register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.DOWNLOAD MANUAL

descriptor.name: boAt Rockerz 330 | Bluetooth Earphone with Upto 30 Hours Nonstop Audio Bliss, Peerless Metallic Control Panel
descriptor.short_desc: boAt Rockerz 330 - Bluetooth EarphonesLet's drench in music and experience every beat differently. Powered with boAt Signature Sound, Rockerz 330 is here to get you grooving to a thumping bass designed only for audiophiles! Keep your charging worries at bay; Rockerz 330 bluetooth earphones offer a dynamic playtime of 30 hours. That's not it! All is takes is 10 minutes of ASAP charge for 10 hours of playtime. This ergonomically designed neckband promises the best of comfort and style. IPX5 protects the Rockerz from sweat and water; so go ahead and make a run to freshen up your mind for these Rockerz don't let anything hold you back. Seamlessly pair two devices at the same time with the dual pairing Bluetooth v5.0. Type C Charging, Single Press Voice Assistant make your audio experience even more enthralling! It's time, LET'S SETTLE for nothing but the best!Upto 30 Hours Nonstop Audio BlissEnjoy music??uninterrupted for up to 30 hours. Rockerz 330 is here to rock your world and make you settle only for the best!10 Minutes = 10 Hours of Dynamic PlaytimeCharge only for 10 minutes and listen to blissful audio for 10 hours! With ASAP Fast Charge, guess who will be your binge-watching partner from now???BOAT Signature SoundPowered with??the BOAT Signature Sound, enjoy the unbeatable sound of the real plus of wireless earphones.??Redefine music with bass that's tuned for a thumping listening experience.??SpecificationsConnect & PlayHeadphone TypeIn-EarIPX RatingIPX5Driver TypeDynamic??Driver Size10mm x 2 DriversImpedance16??Sensitivity (dB)98dB??3DBFrequency Response20Hz-20KHzBattery Capacity (mAh)150 mAhPlayback Timeupto 30??hoursCompatibilityAll Bluetooth DevicesBluetooth Range10 MetersCharging Time30-40 minsCountry Of OriginChinaBluetooth VersionV5.0 IPX 5 Water & Sweat ResistantStop at nothing and complete your daily runs even in pouring rains. Perfect for the outdoors and daily workout.??Stay Connected ThroughoutBluetooth v5.0 makes sure you are connected to your devices seamlessly and the Dual Pairing Feature lets you connect to two devices simultaneously. Get the best of both worlds.FAQQ. Can we accept calls on it? Is it good for calls, meetings, and work from home?Yes, a single press on the multi-function button allows the user to easily accept and reject calls. Rockerz??330 is designed for great clarity and comfort during meetingsand important calls.Q. Can we adjust the length of the wire?No, the length of the wire cannot be adjusted.Q. Does it have a dedicated microphone?Yes, Rockerz??330 earphones have a dedicated mic perfect for calls and recording.Q. Can I charge my earphones with a mobile charger?Yes, Rockerz??330 wireless earphones can be charged with a mobile charger.Q. How long does it take to charge? Does it support fast charging?Rockerz??330 takes around 2H to charge. It does support fast charging.Q. Can we use it while putting the earphones on charge?Yes, one can use the device while charging it at the same time.Q. What Bluetooth version does Rockerz??330 support?Rockerz??330 wireless Bluetooth earphones support Bluetooth v5.0.Q. What can I do with the inline buttons?You can change tracks, adjust volume, take and reject calls, redial, and access voice assistant with the inline buttons. For further information, please refer to the user manual.Q. How can I enable Google and Siri?Double-tap to connect with Google & Siri and activate the voice assistant. Please refer to the manual for further instructions.Q. Is there a warranty for the product? How do I claim warranty?Yes, all of our wireless earphones & headphones come with a 1 year warranty. To register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.DOWNLOAD MANUAL

descriptor.name: boAt Storm Call | Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch with 1.69" HD display, Super-Responsive Dialpad, Ultra Slim & Lightweight, 150+ Cloud Faces, Multiple Sports Mode
descriptor.short_desc: Storm Call - Bluetooth Calling Smart WatchPick. Dial. Connect. Do it all from your wrist with our all-new bluetooth calling smartwatch ??? boAt Storm Call! Dial right from your wrist & experience seamless Bluetooth calling. You can also save up to 10 contacts and explore your world with its 1.69??? HD Display smartwatch. Connections are for everybody with boAt Storm Call.Call with ConvenienceFeaturing a super responsive dial pad, boAt Storm Call not only lets you connect seamlessly via BT Calling but also allows you to save up to 10 contacts. Experience loud and clear calls with its in-built speaker.Big Screen. Better DisplayGet a maximized view of your world with its 1.69??? HD Display. This calling smartwatch comes with a 2.5D Curved Display that produces an immersive touch experience.Sleek and StylishWith just 45gms of weight, this smartwatch is made for long hours of wearing without discomfort. The silicone strap will compliment your look without compromising on durability and comfort.Enhanced and Sharper Colour ResolutionMake your world come alive with its sharp display that is packed with 550 nits of brightness and a high-resolution colour screen with a 70% RGB colour gamut.Guided BreathingGuide yourself to mindfulness with breath awareness and help lower your heart rate to normal. De-stress yourself and keep your mind at peace effortlessly with this calling smartwatch.Prioritize Your WellbeingManage all your health data and vitals anywhere, anytime with SpO2, sleep, calories, and heart rate monitors. Make health your priority with the boAt Storm Call.SpecificationsConnect & PlayModelStorm CallScreen TypeHD DisplayBattery Capacity220 mAhBluetooth VersionBLE 5.0Working Temperature0 to 45 degreeCharging TimeAbout 2.5 hoursWorking Timeupto 7 daysCountry Of OriginChinaFAQsQ. Does Storm call come with different watch faces?Yes, Storm call comes with support for multiple watch faces and themes.Q. Does it have water resistance? Is it good for long-term outdoor use?Storm call comes with IP68 Water resistance which makes it perfect for outdoor use.Q. Does it come with support for GPS?Storm call does not come with an in-built GPS.Q. Does it come with Media controls?Yes, Storm call comes with support for media controls. Now control your music with just a single tap on the watch.Q. How long does Storm call last on a single charge?Storm call has a battery backup of up to 10 days.Q. What Health Features does Storm call support?Storm call comes with a host of health features including custom fitness plans, blood oxygen monitor, breathe control mode, sleep tracking, stress tracker and more. It also fully supports Google Fit and Apple Health. It also supports the Crest App Health Ecosystem for shared fitness plans and goals.Q. Does it support notifications for particular apps?Yes, Storm call supports notification alerts for multiple applications, including calls, texts, social media notifications, sedentary & hydration alerts, and alarms. It also supports temperature monitoring for supported apps.Q. Is there a warranty for the product? How do I claim warranty?Yes, all of our smartwatches come with a 1 year warranty. To register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.DOWNLOAD MANUAL

descriptor.short_desc: Aavante Bar Aaupera Soundbar for Smart TVRaise the bar of your cinematic experience with Aavante Bar Aaupera ??? our all-new smart home theatre system. Say it to play it!Just ask Alexa???Alexa, play indie pop???. Weather, latest cricket score, breaking news, your favourite movie, or your next track. Let our first ever smart soundbar with built-in Alexa keep you on top of your game.Immersive SoundUnforgettable ExperienceExperience deeper bass and sharper highs with our all-new smart home theatre system. Get an immersive sound experience that makes everything sound real. When you turn the Aavante Bar Aaupera on, you tune into a virtual audio world of your making.2.1 Channel Smart SoundbarImmerse In An Audio RealityExperience deeper bass and sharper highs with our all-new smart home theatre system. Get an immersive sound experience that makes everything sound real.When you turn the Aavante Bar Aaupera on, you tune into a virtual audio world of your making.??Always Attentive. Always Listening.Advanced Dual Far Field MicsThe advanced dual far field mics on the smart soundbar listen to your every command from every corner of your home. Now your favourite movie and tracks are just an ???ALEXA?????? away. Say it to play it.Easy To Pair, Easier To PlayMulti-Compatibility ModesWith multi-compatibility modes on our smart home theatre, you can pair instantly with easy bluetooth connectivity or connect via USB, AUX, HDMI (ARC), and optical cables. descriptor.name: boAt Airdopes 131 | Wireless Earbuds with upto 60 Hours Playback, 13mm Drivers and IWP Technology, 650mah C type Charging Case
descriptor.short_desc: Glide yourself towards Nirvana with boAt Airdopes 131 True Wireless earbuds. With IWP??? Technology. It offers additional 12H playtime with the included charging case.
descriptor.long_desc: boAt Airdopes 131 - Wireless EarbudsSleek. Comfortable. Stylish. And a Splash of Incredible Colours. Bring alive your favourite sounds with these??true wireless earbuds Equipped with 13mm drivers for the magical boAt signature sound. Designed for supreme ease with Insta Wake N??? Pair technology that auto connects the moment it???s out of the case and Type C Charging. Tws earbuds??to drown all the sounds you don???t need and live every moment. With a battery capacity of 40mAh for each earbud, indulge in a blissful audio experience for up to 3 hours in a go. Tap into instant wireless functionality with optimum Bluetooth V5.0Connected every momentNever lose a second with seamless Bluetooth 5.0 and Insta??? Wake n Pair, that connects your phone to your earbuds the moment they leave the charging case. Charge your tws bluetooth earphones with Type C for great speed.boAt Signature Sound for music loversWhere sound is everything. The most immersive music experience equipped with 13mm drivers that will transport you to another world.Featherweight for comfort all-dayFeel your music, never the weight of your earbuds. Wireless earbuds designed for ease and flexibility.??SpecificationsConnect & PlayHeadphone TypeIn-EarHD SoundYesBluetooth VersionV5.0+EDRDriver Size13mm x 2 DriversBluetooth ProfilesHSP, HFP, A2DP, AVRCPFrequency20Hz-20KHzVoice AssistantYesCharging Voltage5VDCEarphone battery capacity3.7V, 40mAh x 2 budsTalk time/music time3 Hours per budCharging Time2 HoursStandby Time100 HoursBluetooth Range10MCountry Of OriginChina Upto 60 hours playback timeExperience nonstop playback with 3 hours of sound per charge and overall 60 hours of playback time. Bluetooth earbuds with mic that come with a??650mAh Carry cum Charging case??giving up to 4 times the charge.FAQsQ. How can we pause and play tracks?Single tap the capacitive touch control on either earbud to play a song or to pause one. Airdopes 131 comes with a host of intuitive features that allows one to seamlessly control music. Please refer to the instruction manual to learn about the different ways one can take advantage of its features.Q. Can we accept calls on boAt Airdopes 131?Yes, one can easily accept and reject calls on Airdopes 131. A single press on the multi-functionbutton allows the user to easily accept and reject calls.Q. Can I use any adapter to charge my device?Yes, you can use any adapter to charge your Airdopes 131 Charging case.Q. Are Airdopes 131 waterproof and sweat resistant?NO, Airdopes 131 does not come with dust & water resistance.Q. How long does Airdopes 131 last on a single charge?Airdopes 131 wireless earbuds offer battery backup of up to 3 hours on a single charge. They also give a total playback time of 60 hours along with the charging case.Q. What is the battery capacity of Airdopes 131 and how long does it take to charge?The battery capacity of Airdopes 131 is 40mAh for each earbud and the charging case has a battery capacity of 650mAh. The earbuds take around 1.5H to fully charge.Q. Does it support fast charging?No, Airdopes 131 supports only standard charging.Q. Can I charge my earphones with a mobile charger?Yes, Airdopes 131 supports Type-C charging. If your mobile charger comes with Type-C charging support then you can easily charge your device using your mobile charger.Q. Can I charge my earphones while the case is being charged?Yes, one can simultaneously charge the carrying case and the bluetooth earbuds at the same time.Q. What is the use of the charging case? How long does it take the charging case to charge?The charging case is ergonomically designed to be portable and lightweight. You can carry your in-ear earbuds around while they???re being charged in the case. The charging case takes around 1.5-2 hours to charge.Q. What Bluetooth version do boAt Airdopes 131 support?Airdopes 131 earbuds come with Bluetooth v5.0 technology. These in ear earbuds also support all previous versions of Bluetooth.Q. Are they compatible with iPhones and Android phones?Yes, Airdopes 131 are fully compatible with iPhones and Android devices.Q. How do I reboot/restart my earbuds?In order to reboot your device, turn off Bluetooth on your mobile device, place your earbuds in the case, close the lid, and wait for 10 seconds.Q. How do I factory reset my earbud?In order to factory reset your Airdopes 131, go to the Bluetooth settings on your mobile device, find your Airdopes 131 and select 'forget'.On your Airdopes 131,Step 1: Keep both the earbuds inside the case in their correct orientationStep 2: Triple tap the MFB on both earbuds to perform the reset. Red LED blinks for 1 sec to indicate the same.Step 3: After the reset, close the lid of the carry casePlease refer to the manual for further assistance.Q. How can I connect with Google and Siri?Yes, you can double tap to connect with Google & Siri and activate the voice assistant. Please refer to the manual for further instructions.Q. Is there a warranty for the product? How do I claim warranty?Yes, all of our true wireless earbuds come with a 1 year warranty. To register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.DOWNLOAD MANUAL

descriptor.name: boAt Wave Beat | Best Fitness Tracker Smartwatch with 1.69 HD Display, 7 Day Battery Life, 10+ Sports Modes
descriptor.short_desc: Best Fitness Tracker Smartwatch in IndiaHappiness begins with good health. Wave Beat is here to help you accomplish your goals for a robust lifestyle. With a 1.69 square HD display and a metallic design, Wave Beat is minimal yet fashionable. Wave Beat comes with all the health features you???ll ever need including the boAt Crest app, allowing you to create custom fitness plans, have fitness buddies, wellness crew, gamification and more! Never miss a Beat with more than 10+ sports modes that track your daily calories burnt, steps taken & distances covered and a smart sleep tracker and sedentary reminders to keep you in tip top shape.Beauty On FleekWith its 1.69 HD square display, Wave Beat will have everyone gawking at it. With a max brightness of 550 nits, experience a bright, colourful display outdoors that will shine bright under the harshest conditions. Comfortable and fashionable, Wave Beat combines both seamlessly and inspires confidence in you!Health Comes FirstNever compromise on your health. Wave Beat has you covered all the way with its boAt Crest app that allows you to build custom fitness plans, engage with fitness buddies, keep track of energy scores, sleep scores, wellness crew, gamification and more!Live The Athletic LifeWave Beat supports more than 10 sports modes that will have you up and running. No matter what you???re doing, whether its walking, running, cycling, skipping, badminton, basketball, etc. Wave Beat has a mode for it all! Track your daily calories burnt, steps taken & distances covered with its smart activity tracker that dynamically adjusts to your lifestyle and daily movement.Resist And PersistWave Beat comes with IP68 dust and water resistance that allows for the best protection against dust and water damage. No matter the environment, get on track worryfree because Wave Beat has you covered.Just Keep GoingWave Beat is equipped with a gigantic battery that allows for a 7-day battery-life. Coupled with delicate tweaks and optimisations, Wave Beat ensures it never dies on you and can be on stand-by for at least 30 days.SpecificationsConnect & PlayModelWave BeatScreen Type1.69 inchBattery Capacity220 mAhBluetooth VersionV 5.0Working Temperature0 to 45 degreeCharging TimeAbout 2.5 hoursWorking Timeupto 15 daysCountry Of OriginChinaFAQsQ. Now control your music with just a single tap on the watch.Q. How long does Wave Beat last on a single charge?Wave Beat has a battery backup of up to 15 days.Q. What Health Features does Wave Beat support?Wave Beat comes with a host of health features including custom fitness plans, blood oxygen monitor, breathe control mode, sleep tracking, stress tracker and more.Q. It also supports live cricket scores.Q. Is there a warrantyfor the product? How do I claim warranty?Yes, all of our smartwatches come with a 1 year warranty. The ergonomic design creates passive attenuation of ambient noise while providing maximum comfort for hours of listening pleasure in a snuggly fit without fatigue. descriptor.name: Stone 350 | Wireless Speaker with 10W Stereo Sound, 12H Nonstop Playtime, Lightweight Design, BT, TF Card & AUX Compatible
descriptor.short_desc: Shop for the stylish & trendy Stone 350 portable speaker. Perfect for small groups and chilling vibes, the stone 350stereo sound will ease your mind into comfort.
descriptor.long_desc: Stone 350The Stone 350 comes with 10W Stereo Sound that gives excellentstereo sound designed, the right bass and clarity to your music. With its lightweight cylindrical design, feel the comfort as you carry it everywhere. Not only that, these wireless speakers are further protected by IPX7 dust and water resistance rating to give you the ultimate peace of mind. With its 2200mAh battery capacity, power yourself through 12 hours of immersive listening and be the life of every party! If that isn???t enough, add a second speaker with our TWS technology and enjoy sound, twice as powerful! All of that with multiple EQ and connectivity modes, including Bluetooth v5.0, TF Card & AUX Compatible with both Android and iOS.Kicks in the perfect bass10W stereo sound gives the right bass and clarity to your music. It delivers excellent stereo sound designed by acoustic experts for a complete immersive listening experienceUp to 12H Nonstop PlaytimeWith a battery capacity of 2200mAh, get non-stop entertainment, and power yourself through 12 hours of immersive listening. Be the life of everyparty!IPX7 Splash & Water ResistanceCarry your speakers anywhere with an IPX7 splash & water shield leaving behind the tension of water ruining your speakers and your vibe!??SpecificationsConnect & PlaySpeaker TypeMonoIPX RatingIPX7Driver TypeFull range driverDriver Size52 mmNumber of Drivers1Frequency Response70Hz-70kHzImpedance4??Wireless Technology TypeBluetoothBluetooth Version??V5.0 + EDRBluetooth Range??10MBattery Capacity2200 mAhRated Power10WPlaying Time12??HoursCharging Time??1.5 HoursCountry Of OriginChinaMicrophoneYes TWS for greater??ImpactIt takes two to tango. Add a second speaker with our TWS technology and enjoy sound, twice as powerful. FAQQ. Is it water resistant?Stone 350 comes with IPX7 dust and water resistance.Q. Can we connect it via AUX?Yes, Stone 350 Bluetooth Speakers can also be connected via AUX cable if Bluetooth is not available.Q. Do we get a charger along with the speaker?No, Stone 350 does not come with a charger in the box.Q. Does it have an in-built mic for hands-free calling?Yes, Stone 350 comes with an in-built mic that allows hands-free calling.Q. What is the battery life of the device?Stone 350 offers a battery backup of 4 hours on a single charge.Q. Can we accept calls on it?Yes, one can accept calls on the speakers.Q. Can I charge my speakers with a mobile charger?Yes, Stone 350 can be charged with a mobile charger.Q. Can we use it while putting the speakers on charge?Yes, Stone 350 Portable Speakers can be used simultaneously while charging.Q. Is there a warranty for the product? How do I claim warranty?Yes, all of our speakers come with a 1 year warranty. To register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.DOWNLOAD MANUAL
